title: Zwipes Chenille Microfiber Premium Scratch-Free Car Wash Mitt, 2-Pack
feature: Set of 2 premium extra plush chenille microfiber washing mitt provides scraft-free link-free & swirl-free wash that is gentle on paint.
Increased absorbency that brush, lifts and traps any grime or dirt for a bright clean finish.
The scrubbers on both sides of the mitts create 360-degree flexibility for any cleaning scrubbing or brushing needs.
Great additional to any car wash kit to detail vehicles like sport & luxury cars, SUVs, boats, motorcycles, vans, bikes, bicycles & etc.

Can be used both wet or dry (waterless), with or without chemical detergent soaps or sprays; the microfibers are especially effective at trapping grease, dust, dirt and other particles, enabling you to wipe off fingerprints and smudges with unmatched ease.
Take the gloves indoors to wipe or used as a duster on equipment, shower stalls, blinds, supplies shelf, ceiling fans and other tight spots.
Reusable, long lasting & machine washable (with cold water and tumble dry) quality microfibers. Unlike car wash sponge or pads.
description: Car Wash Mitt, Premium Microfiber Chenille, 2 Package - The Zwipes Microfiber Car Wash Mitt is made of super absorbent microfiber that carries more water and suds for a more efficient and higher quality wash. The super-soft, thick microfiber safely lifts and traps dirt and grime for a brilliant, swirl-free finish. When needed simply toss the mitt in the washing machine. Remember to avoid fabric softener, and for best results we recommend line drying.
